Name: My Lovely Girls
About the game: This is a classic puzzle game. You have to go through 40 levels with 10 girls. With difficulty increases, the girls will look more and more naked, from fully clothed to full nude. All characters over 18 years old. Enjoy ;-) - Puzzle Game - Artworks - Nice music - Steam achievements Keyboard H: Complete Level
